result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donna J Lehr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Arraignment in 14CF59
Initial Appearance in 14CF76, 14CF77, 14CF78
Review Hearing in 14CM53.           
Transcript filed in 14CM53 for all cases.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 5, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Donna J Lehr in court with attorney Annette M. Barna.  Rachel Payne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 14CF76, 14CF77, 14CF78, 14CF84, 14CM53. DE/Atty will waive prelim hearing in 14CF76, 14CF77, 14CF78-Court instructs on waiver of prelim hearing. Court will accept waiver.  Court will find probable cause in all cases, will bind over for JT.  Information has been filed in 76,77,78.  Atty does not wish to proceed to arraignment this day.  Set for arraignment 12-16-14 @ 11:00AM.
14CF84-  Waive formal reading of Criminal Complaint. Set for Prelim hearing 10-29-14 @ 10:00AM.  New charges may be filed and if so will do INIT APP this day also.

Defendant Donna J Lehr in court with attorney Annette M. Barna.  Andrea Amidon Nodolf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 14CM53, 14CF76, 14CF77, 14CF78.   Waive reading of information in 14CF59, enter a plea of NG. No agreement in 14CM53.  Waive formal reading on CC in 14CF76, 14CF77, 14CF78.  Atty asking for concurrent bond in all cases, $1000.00.  Waive time limits for prelim hearing.  Court instructs on waiver of time limits for prelim, court is satisfied will accept waiver of time limits.  Set for prelim hearing 10-21-14 @ 1:00PM, track other cases.  Victim has went to the TO Shelter and completed the paperwork to lift the no contacts.  The court will lift the no contacts, DE will sign a new bond in all cases lifting the no contacts.
Preliminary hearing on October 21, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
